name: Residential Rental Agreement
description: Standard residential lease agreement between landlord and tenant

sections.title: 1. Parties
sections.content: This Rental Agreement is made between {landlord_name} ('Landlord') and {tenant_name} ('Tenant').

sections.title: 2. Property
sections.content: The Landlord agrees to rent to the Tenant the residential property located at: {property_address}

sections.title: 3. Term
sections.content: The lease term is {lease_term}, beginning on {start_date}.

sections.title: 4. Rent
sections.content: The Tenant agrees to pay rent in the amount of ${rent_amount} per month, due on the first day of each month.

sections.title: 5. Security Deposit
sections.content: The Tenant shall pay a security deposit of ${security_deposit} to be held in accordance with state law.
